publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-801# Ms Sandra White: Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff-That the Parliament applauds the stand taken by consultants and staff of the Queen Mother's Maternity Hospital and Royal Hospital for Sick Children at Yorkhill against the closure of the maternity unit which would break the internationally-renowned link between the two hospitals on the one site.
S2M-801# Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff (lodged on 20 January 2004) Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-801# Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff (lodged on 20 January 2004) Michael Matheson*

S2M-801# Ms Sandra White: Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff-That the Parliament applauds the stand taken by consultants and staff of the Queen Mother's Maternity Hospital and Royal Hospital for Sick Children at Yorkhill against the closure of the maternity unit which would break the internationally-renowned link between the two hospitals on the one site. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Michael Matheson
S2M-801# Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff (lodged on 20 January 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-801# Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff (lodged on 20 January 2004) Frances Curran*, Donald Gorrie*, John Swinburne*
S2M-801# Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff (lodged on 20 January 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-801# Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff (lodged on 20 January 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-801# Yorkhill NHS Trust Staff (lodged on 20 January 2004) Jackie Baillie*
